title: Firm on graph will produce SR if price exceeds P2

content.description: Question is based on the following graph, which shows a firm’s marginal cost (MC), average total cost (ATC), and average variable cost (AVC).
content.question: In the short run, the firm will

choices.label: shut down if the price falls below P3
continue to produce as long as the price is greater than P1
continue to produce as long as the price is greater than P2
earn economic profits as long as the price is greater than P2
cover its fixed cost as long as the price is less than P3

content.answer: continue to produce as long as the price is greater than P2
